Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant with water and light, showing it alive and growing.
The student can draw a plant without water, showing it not growing or wilting.
The student can draw a plant without light, showing it not growing or wilting.
The student can show in their drawing that plants need water to grow by depicting difference in plant health with and without water.
The student can show in their drawing that plants need light to grow by depicting difference in plant health in light versus darkness.
